Title: Increases the required distance between a liquor store and a school, church, synagogue or other place of worship
Summary: Increases the required distance between a premises selling liquor and/or wine at retail for consumption off the premises and a school, church, synagogue or other place of worship from 200 to 800 feet.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to the required distance between a premises selling liquor and/or wine at retail for consumption off the premises and a school, church, synagogue or other place of worship
